author: cafter
content: What are your favorite and Free games available on steam?

comments.author: Linggajanitra
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on October 25, 2023, 02:15:37 PMWhat are your favorite and Free games available on steam?There are many free games available on steam. You can search for it easily. There are games Counter Strike 2, Apex Legends, War Thunder, Team Fortress 2, Warframe ... And many other games.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Dota 2.CS:GO turned into CS2 but I haven't played the recent version yet because I'm doing a lot of things.Try to go into the adult games, I've enjoyed one game there but I've forgotten the name but I have finished that game for a week IIRC, it was a fun game and free.Yugi-oh.I can't remember all of those free games that I've got on my library honestly.And if you want more free games, go to another game provider like Steam and that's Epicgames. Every 2 weeks IIRC, they're giving away games consistently. That's where I got my GTA V for free and many zombie games like Dying Light, Tomb Raider and many good quality games.
